actions.name: add_site
actions.description: Adds a site to the set of the user's sites in Search Console.

actions.name: delete_site
actions.description: Removes a site from the set of the user's Search Console sites.

actions.name: list_sitemaps
actions.description: List all your sitemaps for a given site

actions.name: list_sites
actions.description: Lists the user's Search Console sites.

actions.name: search_analytics
actions.description: Query traffic data for your site using the Google Search Console API.

actions.name: submit_sitemap
actions.description: Submits a sitemap for a site.

actions.name: urlInspection
actions.description: Use the URL Inspection action to check the status and presence of a specific page within Google's index.
